Module contents

Test package for grid generator setup module in Worderly.

This package contains unit tests for the grid generation logic, board state management, placement logic, placement rules, and word selection.

Modules:

test_board_state: Tests for board state and grid utilities. test_main_generator: Tests for main board setup functions. test_placement_logic: Tests for placement finding and selection logic. test_placement_rules: Tests for grid validation and placement rules. test_word_selector: Tests for word selection logic. test_menus: Tests for menu-related utilities.
